text:
naH || 
tva(gm) sO#ma piqtRuBi#H saM~MvidAqnO&nuq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI A ta#tantha | 
tasmai# ta indO haqviShA# vidhEma vaqya(gg) syA#maq pata#yO rayIqNAM || 
agni#ShvAttAH pitaraq Eha ga#cCataq sada#H sadaH sadata supraNItayaH | 
aqttA haqvI(gm)Shiq praya#tAni baqrq.hiShyathA# raqyi(gm) sarva#vIraM dadhAtana || 
bar.hi#ShadaH pitara Uqtya#rvAgiqmA vO# haqvyA ca#kRumA juqShaddhva$M | 
ta A gaqtA&*va#sAq SaM ta#mEqnAthAqsmaByaq(gm)q - [  ]  66
